PageTitle: display bgp ipv6 routing-table flap-info regular-expression
FuncDef: The display bgp ipv6 routing-table flap-info regular-expression command displays statistics about the flapping routes that match an AS_Path regular expression.
CLIs: display bgp ipv6 routing-table flap-info regular-expression <as-regular-expression>

ParaDef.Info:
Displays statistics about the flapping routes that match an AS_Path regular expression.
The value is a string of 1 to 80 characters.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp ipv6 routing-table flap-info regular-expression 8
Status codes: * - valid, > - best, d - damped, x - best external, a - add path,
h - history,  i - internal, s - suppressed, S - Stale
Origin : i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete
RPKI validation codes: V - valid, I - invalid, N - not-found
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view statistics about the flapping routes that match an AS_Path regular expression, run the display bgp ipv6 routing-table flap-info regular-expression command.
